name: GSSAdaptiveTabBarController
summary: An adaptive tab bar controller implementation.
description: This project implements an adaptive tab bar controller. Compact environments use the standard UITabBarController, but regular environments use custom tab bar controlller with the tab bar located on the left side of the view. This adaptive tab bar controller takes care of transitioning to the correct controller when the environment changes (i.e. rotation, split screen multitasking, etc.).
